About.title: About Me
About.intro: I am Behlül Bulca, a motivated and curious Econometrics student at Uludağ University with a strong passion for data, machine learning, coding, technology, and problem-solving. I am dedicated to exploring how theoretical knowledge can be translated into practical value and continuously seek opportunities to enhance my skills, both academically and technically.

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Statistical Analysis, Time Series Analysis, Financial Econometrics, Data Analysis Methods.

education.school: Eastern European University of Applied Sciences in Bialystok
education.description: Enhanced adaptability and broadened perspective in multicultural environments.

experience.description: Developing the center's website using modern web technologies. Providing IT support and troubleshooting software issues.

experience.description: Provided IT support, assisted with administrative tasks, and supported operational workflows.

skills.web: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Flask
